title: Multiple Issues
body:
Logged in today. Everything loaded fine and entered ranked. Draft went fine. When the game began I couldn't connect because 'Direct X error, graphics driver' something-or-other. I looked up explanations on Youtube and tried three suggestions. None worked. 

I headed to Riot Support to submit a ticket. Riot Support would not let me log in. The submit ticket screen says I have to login to submit that type of ticket, but when I click login it enters me into a never ending loop until I arrive back at the screen that initially asked me to login. 

I appreciate any and all help with either of these issue. I just want to play some League. 

Sincerely,
ICounterPointI

replies.body: That's really weird it's not letting you login to the ticketing center, but you can also reach out to us via support@riotames.com.  Do you have a screenshot of your error?  Was it a bugsplat, bad image, or something else?

Thank you, Porocles. 

I've emailed support and attached screenshots. Appreciate your help.
